title: Change Locks for Unit Turnover
description: A tenant has moved out. For security, the agent must schedule a locksmith to rekey the unit before the next tenant moves in.

tasks.description: Identify the unit that has just become vacant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the unit's status is 'Vacant'.

tasks.description: Create a work order for a locksmith to rekey the unit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a correctly detailed work order.

tasks.description: Assign the work order to an approved locksmith vendor and schedule the service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully dispatches a locksmith to complete the job.
